Text: thanks a lot for the mother of all AI package, this saves a lot of trouble sorting through which ones I have and don't have.

Pls download this fix:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6549842/%5BFSX%5D_%5BFS9%5D_-_WoAI_Mega_Package_FIX_23_damaged_passangers_airlin

cause gave me error when I uncompressed the RAR file.
There are 23 damaged PASSANGERS airlines.
Just dwload then update the original rar.

Sry fellows
does it contain all the aircrafts? and is it better then adobe ai traffic?

hahahahaha - too funny. Normally I would flame "freeware!" but in light of the recent UT2 lock-up - until we get our hands on hotfix 2.09 - this and MyTraffic appear to be the only viable alternatives. Plus credit should be given for the effort of the compilation. Not pirated, but potentially a Pirate Bay exclusive.
Normally I would bash this. But damn this will save some time, I spent a full day last week downloaded these AI packs and I only got about half of them. Thanks alot.

WoAI is good but not complete. There are several airlines they are not allowed to do, such as BMI and FlyBE. A good complete alternative is  http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5133129/FS2004-Morten__s_AI_Traffic_2.2
